recipe.title: Caramelized Cumin-Roasted Carrots
ingredients: 12 medium to large carrots, peeled, cut on diagonal into 1/2-inch-thick pieces
instructions: Preheat oven to 400°F. Spray large rimmed baking sheet with nonstick spray. Combine carrots and all remaining ingredients in large bowl; toss to coat. Spread in single layer on prepared baking sheet. Roast carrots until tender and lightly caramelized, turning carrots over once, 35 to 40 minutes.
Preheat oven to 400°F. Spray large rimmed baking sheet with nonstick spray.

Combine carrots and all remaining ingredients in large bowl; toss to coat. Spread in single layer on prepared baking sheet. Roast carrots until tender and lightly caramelized, turning carrots over once, 35 to 40 minutes.
